Upgrading from Manywhere Miniblog

Antes de iniciar, por favor repare que algumas funções de rede do b2evolution requerem que você aceite nosso simples Termo de serviço.

As always, it is wise to do a backup of your current website / blog / database (depending on what you already have) before starting to install something new.

Uma vez que você descompatou a distribuição do b2evolution:

  1. On your server, locate the mysql database you are already using for Manywhere Miniblog. You must use the same database for b2evolution to be able to upgrade. Feel safe, b2evolution will not alter your Miniblog tables and data in any way!

    Nota 1: Unless you changed the config, all tables created by b2evolution are prefixed with evo_ . Unless you already have an application using the same prefix, this makes it safe to install b2evolution in a database shared with other applications. For example, Miniblog uses two tables named miniblog and user. Your existing tables will not be affected in any way.
    NOta 2: Porque o mesmo banco de dados? Porque o procidemento SQL que usamos para copiar os dados -- que é rápido e seguro -- pode ser feito apenas com um único banco de dados.
  2. Envie os arquivos do b2evolution para o seu site.

    Nota: Only the contents of the /blogs directory need to be uploaded to your site. If you want b2evolution to handle the homepage of your site, upload the contents of the /blogs folder to your website root. However, you could start by uploading the files to a new subdirectory, /b2evo for example; that way your existing Miniblog remains fully functional while you check out b2evolution.
    Vamos assumir que você instalou o conteúdo da pasta blogs para http://yoursite.com/b2evo ...
  3. Run the installation script on your server. It is located in http://yoursite.com/b2evo/install . Then, simply follow the on screen instructions.

    The installer will ask you a few questions, create required database tables, copy your Miniblog data to b2evo (without affecting Miniblog) and configure b2evolution for you.
  4. Verifique para se certificar que a nova instalação fuinciona.
  5. Em servidores de produção, é recomendado deletar o diretório/install.
  6. Após a instalação básica ser feita, tem alguns segredinhos com os quais você deve tomar cuisado (manual online).
